entry.title: Catgirls Can Have A Little Theft, As A Treat
entry.summary:
Author: atomicpanda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 80,570Chapters: 51/?Kudos: 345

Summary: Waking up as a tween catgirl in the DCU, a self insert into Gotham experiences the thrills of the masked nightlife, fails to combat her new urge to steal, and fails to combat her new feline instincts, all while working towards her goal of bringing good music to a Deathworld. Armed with the power of adorableness and also a deck of cards that hold a unique path to Power, Allison "AlleyKat" Kyle may not shake the world, but she sure as heck is going to knock it off the ledge.

entry.summary:
Author: Aaronymous9

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,301Chapters: 13/70Kudos: 304

Summary: Tim Drake accidentally creates a baby with his and Kon’s DNA while trying to bring him back from the dead. He decides his best course of action is to fake his death and start a new life as a single father. entry.title: You Look So Much Like Him(Your not him But you're all of what we've last left of him)
entry.summary:
Author: NOUFFE

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,994Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 111

Summary: ‘ If you're reading this it means I'm dead ‘ No greeting. No hello. Alfred froze, his heart stopped a moment before his eyes wide in panic and disbelief. Trying to see if it was probably some kind of joke that maybe it was forged but deep inside he knew all too well it isn't. ’ Listen, when I went on this search for Bruce in the time stream, I experienced hell. Something no one should ever survive. My body couldn't keep up, especially with something in me. ‘ Now that was enough to make Alfred's mind whirl in different scenarios. When he last saw the boy he was pale and thin when he returned Bruce back from the time stream and walked off the Manor never to be heard or seen again for months. He didn't want to overthink. Could it be? ’ You guessed it, that's a baby in the basket. Congrats. ‘   Or To where I switch up the TimKon Baby Fic, to a more Tim died giving birth and now the BatFam raises their last memory of their own, while dealing with the grief of loosing a family. Kon comes back alive to know the love of his life is dead and he has a son to raise without Tim.

entry.title: And That We Call Being
entry.summary:
Author: oldrockformations

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,235Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 249

Summary: “I’m Sorry?” If Tim's… friend (would Tim get shot if he were to call Jason his brother?) is feeling particularly gregarious, they might chat about light subjects—the latest trafficking ring Jason's brought down, the newest security measures government agencies have implemented to try and keep Tim out, whatever shenanigans their assorted siblings and sibling-adjacent friends are getting into. But they've always avoided any conversation topics that might be considered heavier. Namely: feelings. It's been a perfectly normal Tuesday morning so far. They haven't exchanged any words today, other than a dry greeting when Tim sat down half-an-hour ago. There's no way they're about to have this conversation right here, right now. "Do you ever think about being a woman?"   Or Jason comes to terms with the idea that he might be a woman, and realizes how loved she is in the process Or Orjesus christ can u imagine the sociopolitical impacts of the red hood coming out as trans
